DESCRIPTION: Orb: Increases amount every turn. When #yEvoked, applies #yIgnite to the enemy with the most HP.
Orb: Applies #yFrostbite to random enemies. When #yEvoked, applies #yWeak and #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
When this card is created, the orb it channels is randomly chosen from #yLightning, #yFrost, #yDark, #yGhostflame, #yBlaze, #ySnow.
